roleset.name: set pen to paper
roleset.note: WRITE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls lecture-37.11-1, performance-26.7-2-1, say-37.7, scribble-25.2, transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1-1 (from write.01-v)

WRITE-N NOTES: Added due to nombank expansion. Member of Vncls lecture-37.11-1, performance-26.7-2-1, say-37.7, scribble-25.2, transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1-1. Comparison to 'write.01'. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from write.01-n)

WRITING-N NOTES: Added due to nombank expansion. Member of Vncls lecture-37.11-1, performance-26.7-2-1, say-37.7, scribble-25.2, transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1-1. Comparison to 'write.01'. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from writing.01-n)

roles.note: Other variations on this construction should be handled as in theother verbs-of-communication like "say".The 'beneficiary' might be included within the 'thing written'; "Johnwrote a letter to Mary" can be parsed either as [a letter] [to Mary]or [a letter to Mary]. Follow whatever Treebank says. (from write.01-v)

example.name: write a letter
example.text: Yasser Arafat has written to the chairman of the International Olympic Committee, *trace* asking him to back a Palestinian bid to join the committee.
example.arg: to the chairman of the International Olympic Committee
*trace* asking him to back a Palestinian bid to join the committee.

example.name: fronted
example.text: ["It's precisely the kind of product that's created the municipal landfill monster,"]-1 the editors wrote *trace*-1.

example.name: thing written as PP
example.text: In June 1988 I wrote in this space about this issue.

example.name: writing optinos
example.text: The FASB rule will cover such financial instruments as interest rate swaps, financial guarantees, foward interest rate contracts, loan contracts, loan commitments and [options]-1 written [*]-1 on securites held.

example.name: Arg 1 in a PP
example.text: The writing of the section on aboriginal culture
example.arg: of the section on aboriginal culture

example.name: Arg 0
example.text: His own writing

example.name: Another form of Arg 1
example.text: Given his penchant for book writing, it is suprising that none of the masters of scandal survival have yet published a guide to the art.

example.name: Arg 1 in a PP
example.text: The writing of the section on aboriginal culture
example.arg: of the section on aboriginal culture

example.name: Arg 0
example.text: His own writing

example.name: Another form of Arg 1
example.text: Given his penchant for book writing, it is suprising that none of the masters of scandal survival have yet published a guide to the art.

example.name: big loss
example.text: In addition, Hadson said it will write off about $3.5 million incosts related to international exploration leases where explorationefforts have been unsuccessful.
example.arg: about $3.5 million in costs related to international exploration leases where exploration efforts have been unsuccessful

example.name: all args
example.text: Ferranti has said that [it]-1 would be forced [*-1]to write off #185 million against the phantom contracts, reducing its net asset value by more than half.
example.arg: reducing its net asset value by more than half

roleset.name: concede as a loss
roleset.note: WRITE_OFF-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No compairson. No VN of FN classes. Framed by Katie (from write.02-n)

role.descr: thing written off; loss; damaged item

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: The write off of their travel expenses was a bonus.

example.name: cheater cheater pumpkin eater
example.text: John's students wrote down all the incorrect answers.

example.name: with target value
example.text: New rules force thrifts to write down their junk to market value, then sell the bonds over five years.

example.name: with EXT
example.text: Granges said [it]-1 also plans [*-1]in the third quarter to write down the carrying value of the Tartan mine by 2.5 million Canadian dollars (US$2.12 million), and to write off most of the C$6.3 million carrying value of its Windflower gold property in British Columbia.
example.arg: the carrying value of the Tartan mine

example.name: write-in candidate
example.text: Mr. Guber says he had crossed out ``MGM'' with a red pen and written in ``Columbia,'' giving the document to Mr. Semel.

example.name: write out a check
example.text: `` And I am not sure that I have any cash -- any money , that is -- but if you will wait just a minute I will write you out a check if I can find my checkbook .
example.arg: if I can find my checkbook

roleset.name: completely write a document, sumarizing, writing completely
roleset.note: WRITE_UP-V NOTES: Roleset for 'write up' based on instances in Webtext-SEL. Framed by Claire. (from write.07-v)
WRITE_UP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, write_up.07. No VNcls. (from write.03-n)

example.name: No benefactive mentioned
example.text: So , if you reckon 0 you can do some research and write [this]-1 up *PRO*-1 augmented *-1 by photos from the prior point that would be grand .
example.arg: *PRO*-1 augmented *-1 by photos from the prior point

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Thanks to Wayfaring Okie for his write-up of our new album at BrooklynCountry.com.
